tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_data (
  patient_id VARCHAR(10),
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_age INT,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment_plan TEXT,
  blockchain_hash VARCHAR(64)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    dob DATE,
    gender CHAR(1),
    address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    treatment VARCHAR(100),
    date_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_data (
    block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    hash VARCHAR(64),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    nonce INT
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance (
    regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    date_published DATE,
    date_effective DATE
);

CREATE TABLE hospital_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment TEXT,
    record_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES healthcare_data(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    table_accessed VARCHAR(255),
    action VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
